tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE court_cases (
  case_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  case_title VARCHAR(255),
  case_description TEXT,
  violation_type VARCHAR(50),
  accused_party VARCHAR(100),
  court_location VARCHAR(100),
  filing_date DATE,
  hearing_date DATE,
  verdict VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE human_rights_violations (
    case_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    case_name VARCHAR(255),
    violation_type VARCHAR(100),
    location VARCHAR(100),
    date_occurred DATE
);

CREATE TABLE legal_analysis (
    analysis_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    case_id INT,
    analyst_name VARCHAR(255),
    analysis_date DATE,
    analysis_result TEXT
    FOREIGN KEY (case_id) REFERENCES human_rights_violations(case_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Plaintiffs (
 plaintiff_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
 plaintiff_name VARCHAR(255),
 nationality VARCHAR(50),
 age INT,
 case_id INT,
 FOREIGN KEY (case_id) REFERENCES CourtCases (case_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Defendants (
 defendant_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
 defendant_name VARCHAR(255),
 organization VARCHAR(100),
 case_id INT,
 FOREIGN KEY (case_id) REFERENCES CourtCases (case_id)
);

CREATE TABLE HumanRightsCases (
  case_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  case_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  violation_type VARCHAR(100),
  country_code CHAR(2),
  court_location VARCHAR(100),
  date_filed DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Defendants (
  defendant_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  case_id UUID REFERENCES HumanRightsCases(case_id),
  defendant_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  nationality VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE Lawyers (
  lawyer_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  lawyer_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  specialty VARCHAR(50),
  years_practiced INT,
  fee DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE Proceedings (
  proceeding_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  case_id UUID REFERENCES HumanRightsCases(case_id),
  proceeding_date DATE,
  judge_name VARCHAR(255),
  outcome TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE court_cases (
 case_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 case_name VARCHAR(255),
 case_description TEXT,
 case_date DATE,
 case_status VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE victims (
 victim_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 case_id INT,
 victim_name VARCHAR(255),
 victim_age INT,
 victim_gender VARCHAR(10),
 FOREIGN KEY (case_id) REFERENCES court_cases(case_id)
);

CREATE TABLE defendants (
 defendant_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 case_id INT,
 defendant_name VARCHAR(255),
 defendant_role VARCHAR(50),
 FOREIGN KEY (case_id) REFERENCES court_cases(case_id)
);

CREATE TABLE evidence (
 evidence_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 case_id INT,
 evidence_details TEXT,
 evidence_type VARCHAR(50),
 FOREIGN KEY (case_id) REFERENCES court_cases(case_id)
);

CREATE TABLE rulings (
 ruling_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 case_id INT,
 ruling_text TEXT,
 ruling_date DATE,
 FOREIGN KEY (case_id) REFERENCES court_cases(case_id)
);
